trans-unit.source: This set of ID photos might not be applicable under certain circumstances in this app. Also, a disclaimer: The Genshin-style character ID photos are **NOT from leaked character design assets from Hoyoverse / Cognosphere / MiHoYo**. Instead, these assets are rendered using [the MikuMikuDance models released by MiHoYo in public](https://www.aplaybox.com/u/516827875).
trans-unit.target: This set of ID photos might not be applicable under certain circumstances in this app. Also, a disclaimer: The Genshin-style character ID photos are **NOT from leaked character design assets from Hoyoverse / Cognosphere / MiHoYo**. Instead, these assets are rendered using [the MikuMikuDance models released by MiHoYo in public](https://www.aplaybox.com/u/516827875).

trans-unit.source: The background totem assets used for ID Photos of Genshin Impact characters in this app are from Star Rail (excl. Geo, Dendro, and Hydro), representing the Teyvat Element of each character. These totems is visible only if “Use Namecard backgrounds for Genshin Characters’ ID Photos and ShowCase Build panels” is disabled.
trans-unit.target: The background totem assets used for ID Photos of Genshin Impact characters in this app are from Star Rail (excl. Geo, Dendro, and Hydro), representing the Teyvat Element of each character. These totems is visible only if “Use Namecard backgrounds for Genshin Characters’ ID Photos and ShowCase Build panels” is disabled.

trans-unit.source: The background totem assets used for ID Photos of Star Rail in this app are for representing both their life paths and their elemental powers. The element is represented by the color used for rendering the totem.
trans-unit.target: The background totem assets used for ID Photos of Star Rail in this app are for representing both their life paths and their elemental powers. The element is represented by the color used for rendering the totem.

trans-unit.target: Either no detail-exposable characters in the showcase or (in case of Genshin Impact) the UID owner didn't enable "Show Character Details" in the game. If you are the UID owner, you may follow the following screenshot to config the showcase in the game.

trans-unit.source: Genshin Only. E.g.: Raiden Shogun with over-900 elemental master (and related 4-piece artifact sets) can team up with Baizhu, Furina, and Nahida to be the strongest full-auto guided remote hyperbloom team. This disobeys the initial character design of Raiden Shogun but is an acceptable and effective choice with significantly-reduced workload of building-up the entire team with significantly larger firing range than Shinobu-Yukuaki-based close-combat hyperbloom teams. Similar situations may apply to other electro characters in Genshin Impact.
trans-unit.target: Genshin Only. E.g.: Raiden Shogun with over-900 elemental master (and related 4-piece artifact sets) can team up with Baizhu, Furina, and Nahida to be the strongest full-auto guided remote hyperbloom team. This disobeys the initial character design of Raiden Shogun but is an acceptable and effective choice with significantly-reduced workload of building-up the entire team with significantly larger firing range than Shinobu-Yukuaki-based close-combat hyperbloom teams. Similar situations may apply to other electro characters in Genshin Impact.

trans-unit.target: Consider catalysis reactions triggered with anemo characters

trans-unit.source: Genshin Only. E.g.: Kaedehara Kazuha with 4-piece Thundering Fury artifact suite is now considered as an acceptable choice to trigger dendro catalysis. Similar situations may apply to other anemo characters in Genshin Impact.
trans-unit.target: Genshin Only. E.g.: Kaedehara Kazuha with 4-piece Thundering Fury artifact suite is now considered as an acceptable choice to trigger dendro catalysis. Similar situations may apply to other anemo characters in Genshin Impact.

trans-unit.source: This app does not contain paid gacha. The Gacha Record Manager in this app only allows users to manage their personal gacha records for some of the games supported by this app. // Your gacha records in this app will only be stored in the private iCloud space of your current Apple ID, as well as on any Apple devices that are signed in with that Apple ID and have this app installed and in-use, hence no privacy concerns needed. // Zenless Zone Zero is currently not supported by this feature.
trans-unit.target: This app does not contain paid gacha. The Gacha Record Manager in this app only allows users to manage their personal gacha records for some of the games supported by this app. // Your gacha records in this app will only be stored in the private iCloud space of your current Apple ID, as well as on any Apple devices that are signed in with that Apple ID and have this app installed and in-use, hence no privacy concerns needed. // Zenless Zone Zero is currently not supported by this feature.

trans-unit.source: GIGF (Genshin Impact Gacha-Exchangeable Format) indicates UIGF v3.0 and earlier. The feature of importing these obsolete formats is only considered for importing old backup files generated by this app.
trans-unit.target: GIGF (Genshin Impact Gacha-Exchangeable Format) indicates UIGF v3.0 and earlier. The feature of importing these obsolete formats is only considered for importing old backup files generated by this app.

trans-unit.source: This app does not support importing GIGF formats older than UIGF v2.0 due to the lack of too many crucial information fields.
trans-unit.target: This app does not support importing GIGF formats older than UIGF v2.0 due to the lack of too many crucial information fields.

trans-unit.source: ⚠︎ UIGF v2.3 (and earlier) JSON files & UIGF v2.2 Excel Spreadsheets are exported without timezone information, and the apps used for generating these files may have individual behaviors in handling timezone information. - For such files generated by Snap Hutao (v1.7.16_2023-11-10 and earlier) in these deprecated formats, please set the fallback time zone to UTC+0. - For such files generated by Xunkong (v1.4.4_2024-04-24) in these deprecated formats, please set the fallback time zone to the server time zone. Xunkong provided no UIGF v2.4 support and they introduced the gacha timezone support with UIGF v3.0 support starts from v1.5.0 update on 2024-09-21. - For such files generated by Teyvat Helper (YShelper), please set the fallback time to the device time where this file was generated and exported by Teyvat Helper.
trans-unit.target: ⚠︎ UIGF v2.3 (and earlier) JSON files & UIGF v2.2 Excel Spreadsheets are exported without timezone information, and the apps used for generating these files may have individual behaviors in handling timezone information. - For such files generated by Snap Hutao (v1.7.16_2023-11-10 and earlier) in these deprecated formats, please set the fallback time zone to UTC+0. - For such files generated by Xunkong (v1.4.4_2024-04-24) in these deprecated formats, please set the fallback time zone to the server time zone. Xunkong provided no UIGF v2.4 support and they introduced the gacha timezone support with UIGF v3.0 support starts from v1.5.0 update on 2024-09-21. - For such files generated by Teyvat Helper (YShelper), please set the fallback time to the device time where this file was generated and exported by Teyvat Helper.

trans-unit.source: SRGF v1.0, established by the UIGF committee, is an exchangeable format for gacha records of Star Rail, a game produced by Cognosphere and MiHoYo. Although this format is marked as a vintage format and is replaced by UIGF v4.0, there are some excellent apps on Windows which only conforms to SRGF v1.0, hence the option here for compatibility purposes.
trans-unit.target: SRGF v1.0, established by the UIGF committee, is an exchangeable format for gacha records of Star Rail, a game produced by Cognosphere and MiHoYo. Although this format is marked as a vintage format and is replaced by UIGF v4.0, there are some excellent apps on Windows which only conforms to SRGF v1.0, hence the option here for compatibility purposes.

trans-unit.source: UIGF v4.0, established by the UIGF committee, is a coalescent exchangeable format for gacha records of many games produced by Cognosphere and MiHoYo.
trans-unit.target: UIGF v4.0, established by the UIGF committee, is a coalescent exchangeable format for gacha records of many games produced by Cognosphere and MiHoYo.

trans-unit.source: Due to occasional server-side accidents, the game server may return duplicated gacha entries with incorrect transaction IDs, polluting the local database. If the bleaching mode is enabled, this app will use the latest fetch results as the trust source of correct transaction IDs and remove the incorrect entries on the local side, but this can be deceived by the polluted data from the game server. Nevertheless, as long as a game version deprecates, all gacha records during its operation period will become static and trustable.
trans-unit.target: Due to occasional server-side accidents, the game server may return duplicated gacha entries with incorrect transaction IDs, polluting the local database. If the bleaching mode is enabled, this app will use the latest fetch results as the trust source of correct transaction IDs and remove the incorrect entries on the local side, but this can be deceived by the polluted data from the game server. Nevertheless, as long as a game version deprecates, all gacha records during its operation period will become static and trustable.

trans-unit.source: Local database can get polluted? Why?

trans-unit.source: The primary languages of this app are English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, and Japanese. All other languages are secondary, as no one in the development team can fluently understand or use them. We rely on ChatGPT to create draft translations for these languages, and we warmly welcome volunteers who wish to help improve them. Having a Mac with Xcode 16 (or a later version) installed will make it much easier for contributors to participate.
trans-unit.target: The primary languages of this app are English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, and Japanese. All other languages are secondary, as no one in the development team can fluently understand or use them. We rely on ChatGPT to create draft translations for these languages, and we warmly welcome volunteers who wish to help improve them. Having a Mac with Xcode 16 (or a later version) installed will make it much easier for contributors to participate.

trans-unit.source: - The successor of both PizzaHelper4Genshin and PizzaHelper4HSR. trans-unit.target: - The successor of both PizzaHelper4Genshin and PizzaHelper4HSR. trans-unit.source:
New UI language settings of an app on macOS / iOS always require the app to restart to make sure the new language setting becomes effective to it. Even if the user manually change this through System Settings, user will still be prompted the necessity of restarting the app, and it will be not this app but the macOS / iOS who prompts it.
We make this language switcher here to save users some seconds. This design is extremely ADHD-friendly since ADHD patients are likely to forgot what they are about to do while flipping among nested pages in iOS / macOS System Settings.
This app will quit after you confirm this message.
trans-unit.target:
New UI language settings of an app on macOS / iOS always require the app to restart to make sure the new language setting becomes effective to it. Even if the user manually change this through System Settings, user will still be prompted the necessity of restarting the app, and it will be not this app but the macOS / iOS who prompts it.
We make this language switcher here to save users some seconds. This design is extremely ADHD-friendly since ADHD patients are likely to forgot what they are about to do while flipping among nested pages in iOS / macOS System Settings.
This app will quit after you confirm this message.

trans-unit.source: Login by scanning the QR code
trans-unit.target: Login by scanning the QR code

trans-unit.source: To get resin and other data from HoYoLAB / Miyoushe, UID and login cookie of your account is needed. After logging into HoYoLAB / Miyoushe, we will store them locally as well as on your private iCloud. Then our app will use the stored UID and cookie to get the resin and other information in a way similar to HoYoLAB / Miyoushe app, then display them on your widget. Your private information will not be sent to other places other than HoYoLAB / Miyoushe and iCloud, including us, so your personal information will be very secure. This App is an opensource project. Everyone can check and supervise all the underlying behaviors of this program.
trans-unit.target: To get resin and other data from HoYoLAB / Miyoushe, UID and login cookie of your account is needed. After logging into HoYoLAB / Miyoushe, we will store them locally as well as on your private iCloud. Then our app will use the stored UID and cookie to get the resin and other information in a way similar to HoYoLAB / Miyoushe app, then display them on your widget. Your private information will not be sent to other places other than HoYoLAB / Miyoushe and iCloud, including us, so your personal information will be very secure. This App is an opensource project. Everyone can check and supervise all the underlying behaviors of this program.

trans-unit.source: This procedure is not an illegal procedure such as plug-ins. This program abides by the relevant content of miHoYo's secondary creation rules. This App is an opensource project. Everyone can check and supervise all the underlying behaviors of this program. For details, see Settings - FAQ.
trans-unit.target: This procedure is not an illegal procedure such as plug-ins. This program abides by the relevant content of miHoYo's secondary creation rules. This App is an opensource project. Everyone can check and supervise all the underlying behaviors of this program. For details, see Settings - FAQ.

trans-unit.source: Click the "Done" button at the top-trailing corner of the app screen after you finish login to HoYoLAB in the following webpage. If you are prompted for CAPTCHA, please finish it.
trans-unit.target: Click the "Done" button at the top-trailing corner of the app screen after you finish login to HoYoLAB in the following webpage. If you are prompted for CAPTCHA, please finish it.

trans-unit.source: To ensure you feel safe with this, here’s how it works: Your password input is protected by macOS built-in SecureEventInputAPI (or its equivalent on iOS), and then it will be directly handled by HoYoLAB login webpage. This is the nature of how WKWebView gets designed by Apple. Nobody else can interfere / intercept this process, nor this app. You can see that you cannot switch to 3rd-party input methods while the password is receiving inputs from the user.
trans-unit.target: To ensure you feel safe with this, here’s how it works: Your password input is protected by macOS built-in SecureEventInputAPI (or its equivalent on iOS), and then it will be directly handled by HoYoLAB login webpage. This is the nature of how WKWebView gets designed by Apple. Nobody else can interfere / intercept this process, nor this app. You can see that you cannot switch to 3rd-party input methods while the password is receiving inputs from the user.

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ 3rd-party sign-in services like Google, Facebook, Twitter, Sign-in-with-Apple, etc. ARE NOT TECHNICALLY SUPPORTABLE IN THIS APP, please sign in with your username & password.
trans-unit.target: ⚠️ 3rd-party sign-in services like Google, Facebook, Twitter, Sign-in-with-Apple, etc. ARE NOT TECHNICALLY SUPPORTABLE IN THIS APP, please sign in with your username & password.

trans-unit.source:
Beware of these things before you proceed:
→ This app is NOT made for the creation nor deletion of HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account. Such actions are supposed to be done through HoYoLAB / Miyoushe app or official website services provided by MiHoYo / Cognosphere. You may tap the management link (see the top-trailing corner of this window) to proceed to that website service page.
→ A HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account must have been used to play the game (you specified above) AT LEAST ONCE in order to be usable in this app.
→ A related game account (under the managment of its related HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account) must enable the public visibility of the character showcase through in-game settings in order to let the related information displayable in this app.
trans-unit.target:
Beware of these things before you proceed:
→ This app is NOT made for the creation nor deletion of HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account. Such actions are supposed to be done through HoYoLAB / Miyoushe app or official website services provided by MiHoYo / Cognosphere. You may tap the management link (see the top-trailing corner of this window) to proceed to that website service page.
→ A HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account must have been used to play the game (you specified above) AT LEAST ONCE in order to be usable in this app.
→ A related game account (under the managment of its related HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account) must enable the public visibility of the character showcase through in-game settings in order to let the related information displayable in this app.

trans-unit.source: Regarding how to Manage or Delete your HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account
trans-unit.target: Regarding how to Manage or Delete your HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account

trans-unit.source: The above link guides you to: %@
trans-unit.target: The above link guides you to: %@

trans-unit.source: The above link works on all devices. Users can also use HoYoLAB App (iPhone) to finish the account withdrawal (deletion).
trans-unit.target: The above link works on all devices. Users can also use HoYoLAB App (iPhone) to finish the account withdrawal (deletion).

trans-unit.source:
Miyoushe expects that users need to use either cellphone or Miyoushe App (iPhone) to finish the account withdrawal (deletion).
If you are on macOS, you can change the user-agent of your Safari browser to iPhone in order to see the account deletion link. For more information regarding how to use the developer menu in Safari on macOS to change its user-agent, please contact Apple Support.
The above link, if directly clicked, will automatically apply the user-agent of iPhone.
trans-unit.target:
Miyoushe expects that users need to use either cellphone or Miyoushe App (iPhone) to finish the account withdrawal (deletion).
If you are on macOS, you can change the user-agent of your Safari browser to iPhone in order to see the account deletion link. For more information regarding how to use the developer menu in Safari on macOS to change its user-agent, please contact Apple Support.
The above link, if directly clicked, will automatically apply the user-agent of iPhone.

trans-unit.source: You acknowledge and agree that as a result of deleting your Account, you will lose access to all services related to all games developed by MiHoYo / Cognosphere, including the account information, subscriptions and all game-related information linked to such Account and permanently lose the possibility to access other services through the Account.
trans-unit.target: You acknowledge and agree that as a result of deleting your Account, you will lose access to all services related to all games developed by MiHoYo / Cognosphere, including the account information, subscriptions and all game-related information linked to such Account and permanently lose the possibility to access other services through the Account.

trans-unit.source: You may confirm this consequence by consulting HoYoLAB / Miyoushe support.
trans-unit.target: You may confirm this consequence by consulting HoYoLAB / Miyoushe support.

trans-unit.target: ⚠️ Due to a limitation in the UIKit-to-AppKit bridge framework, the DatePicker on macOS doesn’t show the input panel in macCatalyst apps. Users can only select the desired input field and type it directly on physical keyboard.

trans-unit.target: * Genshin Impact and Star Rail only.

trans-unit.source: This app or its widgets will attempt to automatically reschedule relevant notifications when retrieving Real-Time Note data for a specific local profile. During each scheduling, it will proactively try to clear any previously scheduled, unreasonable, and unsent notifications made for this local profile. Notifications will only be scheduled if the system settings allow the app to send system notifications, and if the app has successfully retrieved real-time note data, in cases where the relevant preferences permit it.
trans-unit.target: This app or its widgets will attempt to automatically reschedule relevant notifications when retrieving Real-Time Note data for a specific local profile. During each scheduling, it will proactively try to clear any previously scheduled, unreasonable, and unsent notifications made for this local profile. Notifications will only be scheduled if the system settings allow the app to send system notifications, and if the app has successfully retrieved real-time note data, in cases where the relevant preferences permit it.

trans-unit.source: Halt submission to HutaoDB until username is filled here
trans-unit.target: Halt submission to HutaoDB until username is filled here

trans-unit.source: Snap Hutao may release some benefits to a user if the username field here is correctly supplied in the uploaded battle report. Snap Hutao reserves the rights to explain the further details. If the enforcer toggle is ON, your battle reports will be uploaded to HutaoDB **only if** the username field is **not** blank.
trans-unit.target: Snap Hutao may release some benefits to a user if the username field here is correctly supplied in the uploaded battle report. Snap Hutao reserves the rights to explain the further details. If the enforcer toggle is ON, your battle reports will be uploaded to HutaoDB **only if** the username field is **not** blank.

trans-unit.source: Allow to Collect Spiral Abyss Battle Reports Data
trans-unit.target: Allow to Collect Spiral Abyss Battle Reports Data

trans-unit.source: We are looking forward to collect the Genshin characters you own and you used in the Spiral Abyss and send them to Snap.Hutao Database (i.e. HutaoDB) and Pizza DB. Allowing us to collect the data will help HutaoDB & PizzaAbyssDB to supply more-accurate information of the real-time Spiral Abyss Chacacter Usage Rate, Team Usage Rate, etc. information available-to-watch in the App. The information also consists of the related in-game Genshin UID but no other of your game account information to help HutaoDB potentially refuse forged records from identified cheaters.
trans-unit.target: We are looking forward to collect the Genshin characters you own and you used in the Spiral Abyss and send them to Snap.Hutao Database (i.e. HutaoDB) and Pizza DB. Allowing us to collect the data will help HutaoDB & PizzaAbyssDB to supply more-accurate information of the real-time Spiral Abyss Chacacter Usage Rate, Team Usage Rate, etc. information available-to-watch in the App. The information also consists of the related in-game Genshin UID but no other of your game account information to help HutaoDB potentially refuse forged records from identified cheaters.

trans-unit.source: Tap here to read the FAQs about it.
trans-unit.target: Tap here to read the FAQs about it.

trans-unit.source:

trans-unit.source:
SwiftData does not support changing the location of a database container while it is being used, hence the necessity of restarting the app.
The app will restart after you confirm this message.
trans-unit.target:
SwiftData does not support changing the location of a database container while it is being used, hence the necessity of restarting the app.
The app will restart after you confirm this message.

trans-unit.source: Import all UIDs of these games from this account
trans-unit.target: Import all UIDs of these games from this account

trans-unit.source: This option is extremely helpful to let the server know that you are really using your HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account on your own devices. Individual logins per UID for each game and each game-server may let the HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account server misunderstood how many device this HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account gets logged into, leading to earlier expiration of your cookies. If profile duplication happens during this process, then the existing profile will be updated instead with new cookie, the latest device fingerprint, and the latest device ID instead.
trans-unit.target: This option is extremely helpful to let the server know that you are really using your HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account on your own devices. Individual logins per UID for each game and each game-server may let the HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account server misunderstood how many device this HoYoLAB / Miyoushe account gets logged into, leading to earlier expiration of your cookies. If profile duplication happens during this process, then the existing profile will be updated instead with new cookie, the latest device fingerprint, and the latest device ID instead.

trans-unit.source: Automatically initiate Stamina Timer Live Activity
trans-unit.target: Automatically initiate Stamina Timer Live Activity

trans-unit.source: You can slide the Dynamic Island from left / right to the middle to hide it. Swipe left on the Stamina Timer on the lock screen to turn off the resin timer and the Dynamic Island.
trans-unit.target: You can slide the Dynamic Island from left / right to the middle to hide it. Swipe left on the Stamina Timer on the lock screen to turn off the resin timer and the Dynamic Island.

trans-unit.source: Stamina Timer is how this app utilizes the Live Activity feature of the iOS. You can click the ellipsis circle to the right of the Real-Time Note of a local profile in the Today tab to initiate it.
trans-unit.target: Stamina Timer is how this app utilizes the Live Activity feature of the iOS. You can click the ellipsis circle to the right of the Real-Time Note of a local profile in the Today tab to initiate it.
